entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Flin Flon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Flin Flon Airport 06:20 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
